titleStmt.title: A deuoute treatise vpon the Pater noster, made fyrst in latyn by the moost famous doctour mayster Erasmus Roterodamus, and tourned in to englisshe by a yong vertuous and well lerned gentylwoman of. xix. yere of age
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.

titleStmt.title: A deuoute treatise vpon the Pater noster, made fyrst in latyn by the moost famous doctour mayster Erasmus Roterodamus, and tourned in to englisshe by a yong vertuous and well lerned gentylwoman of. xix. yere of age
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Roper, Margaret, 1505-1544.
Hyrde, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: In fletestrete, in the house of Thomas Berthelet nere to the Cundite, at the signe of Lucrece,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
"Here after foloweth the seuyn peticions of the Pater noster, translated out of Latyn into Englysshe" has caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
